description:
The boys of Bass High plan to take down Cromartie. And while Hayashida complains about how boring their school is, the Bass boys find that the grass is always weirder on the other side.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment le lycée Berth tenta d`infiltrer Cromartie
Cromartie High School vs. Bass High School: The Conflict Intensifies! / The Idle Student / At Least It`s a Battle Without Honor or Humanity
Cromartie Koukou vs Bass Koukou: Kousou Gekika! / Gakuen Taikutsu Otoko / Sukutomo Jingi Naki Tatakai
クロマティ高校VSバース高校 抗争激化! / 学園退屈男 / 少くとも仁義なき戦い
